questions.text: In the beginning of the movie, George Webber (Dudley Moore) was given a surprise birthday party by his girlfriend Samantha 'Sam' Taylor (Julie Andrews). How old was he?

While George was driving through Beverly Hills, he saw Jenny Mills (Bo Derek) wearing a wedding dress in a limousine. George was so transfixed on her; he lost his concentration while driving. What ended up happening?
questions.correct: He crashed into a Beverly Hills Police Car.
options: He stalled his car, causing great embarrassment in front of her.
He ran a red light and almost caused an accident.
He went straight to his shrink to tell him about the beautiful woman he had just seen.
questions.explanation:
He crashed into a Beverly Hills Police Car.

	After he crashed into the police car, he ended up having an expired license, no registration, and getting charged for reckless driving.

questions.text: While lying down in bed, George and Sam got into an argument. What started the argument was when George was referring to women as _____?
questions.explanation:
Broads.

	Sam told George that she was fed-up with him referring to 'sexually emancipated ladies ... as broads.'

questions.text: It turned out that Jenny's father was a dentist. So, George ended up going to see him for a checkup. How many cavities did he have?
questions.explanation:
6.

	All of the novocain put in George's mouth led to some hilarious sequences in the film.

questions.text: After George visited the dentist, he found out that Jenny was in Mexico on her honeymoon. Where was she?
questions.explanation:
Manzanillo.

	George followed her down to 'Hotel Las Hadas', in Manzanillo, Colima, Mexico.

Mustard yellow.

	One of the most famous scenes in movies is of Bo Derek running up the beach in her swimsuit.

questions.text: Jenny and David (her husband) saw George on a television show. What was the name of the show?
questions.explanation:
'Dinah Shore'.

	Jenny said to George, 'I have to be honest. I didn't know who you were or what you did....but I said to David, 'Now there's a really attractive older man'.'

questions.text: What cocktail did George drink while on the beach?
Who did George become friends with at the hotel?
questions.explanation:
The bartender.

	Brian Dennehy played the bartender.

questions.text: Last of all, what musical piece was being played during the famous bedroom scene with George and Jenny?
options: Beethoven: Adagio sostenuto from Piano Sonata No. 14, 'Moonlight'
